comment.author: 69005233@N00
comment._content: From the Baseball Almanac site: Coach James Thomas "Deacon" McGuire born Nov-18-1863 in Youngstown, Ohio. Finished up his 26 year career as a catcher playing for the Detroit Tigers in the 1912 season. He then coached at Detroit for another few years. First baseman Del Gainer Dellos Clinton "Del" Gainer born Nov-10-1886 in Montrose, West Virginia Shortstop Donie Bush Owen Joseph "Donie" Bush born Oct-08-1887 in Indianapolis, Indiana Left Fielder Bobby Veach Robert Hayes "Bobby" Veach born Jun-29-1888 in St. Charles, Kentucky
